source_text: upon commencement of production, Barfuss Corporation is entitled to a 2% net smelter royalty;
additional_details: The royalty is received by Barfuss Corporation. It is payable by the operating entity (implied to be Castillo Copper Limited or the joint venture it forms with Barfuss Corporation) upon commencement of production from the Harts Range Niobium, Uranium & Heavy Rare Earths Project.
